Quantum Computer Security Proofs Bethel Platform incorporates cutting-edge quantum-resistant cryptographic measures to safeguard against potential future threats posed by quantum computing advancements. Bethel ZKPe Enterprise Security Protocol Bethel's Zero-Knowledge Proof Enterprise (ZKPe) security protocol enhances enterprise security by overlaying existing data storage infrastructure with advanced zero-knowledge proofs. This ensures data protection against unauthorized access and breaches without disrupting current systems.
